oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RARE: Future trends for the organic market II
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of the program (1 project) concerns the development of a method to allow a permanent device of datas about the consumption of the organic products in France. The second aim is to develop (from convergence groups between consumers and other actors a tool for construction of longer-term orientations for future organic supply chains.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} RARE: Future trends for the organic market II. Runs 2005 - 2006. Programme Leader(s): Fran√ßois, Martine.
